Plot: A documentary that follows six young dancers from around the world as they prepare for the Youth America Grand Prix, one of the most prestigious ballet competitions in the world.
Title: First Position
Actors: Aran Bell, Rebecca Houseknecht, Joan Sebastian Zamora, Miko Fogarty
tomatoConsensus: An upbeat and visually dramatic documentary of children's ballet, First Position displays the potential of the human spirit when fostered at a young age.
